title: Asthma Exercise
content:
* If you are outside and it's cold, wear a thin, warm scarf loosely around your lower face to help warm the air you breathe.
  * Check the pollen count forecasts. The [MetService(external link)](https://www.metservice.com/ "Open external link") in Aotearoa New Zealand provides pollen forecasts. They appear in the sidebar to the left of the weather forecast when you search by location.
  * Avoid being exposed to heavily polluted air.
